meanings.definition: A type of shrub with fragrant white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The philadelphus in our garden smells so nice.
meanings.sent2: I planted a philadelphus bush by the fence.
meanings.sent3: The bees love buzzing around the philadelphus in bloom.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like the sweet scent of philadelphus.
meanings.sent5: The white petals of the philadelphus danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the family Hydrangeaceae.
meanings.sent1: The philadelphus genus includes many beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the different species within the philadelphus genus.
meanings.sent3: The rare philadelphus plant made the gardener jump for joy.
meanings.sent4: The philadelphus plants stood tall like soldiers in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The delicate leaves of the philadelphus genus shimmered in the sunlight.
